Package spaska.classifiers

Contains classifier algorithms and the interface for them.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IClassifier
    An interface representing all classifiers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecisionTree
    A dicision tree algorithm based on ID3 and C4.5.
    KNN
    Implementation of the K-Nearest Neighbor classifier.
    NaiveBayes
    A simple implementation of the Naive Bayes classifier.
    OneR
    A classifier that builds a one level tree which identifies what's the attribute that distinguish the instances in the training set.
    TwoLayerPerceptron
    Classifier that is based on neural two layer networks that learns with backpropagation.
    ZeroR
    A classifier that just labels all instances to the most frequent class in the training dataset.

Package spaska.classifiers Description

Contains classifier algorithms and the interface for them. This package groups all classifiers in a common package. There is also a subpackage the contains utilities that are useful and convenient for their implementation.
